summary: A Dragonscale hood to replace Dragonscale helmets using the Thalmor mesh and textures made from scratch.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/4884-1-1325201749.jpg[/img]


[color=deepskyblue][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/color]

I couldn\'t bear the idea that a suit of dragon scales and skin made for sneaking included a clunky, ostentatious helmet. While the model for the original helmet is actually quite nice, I don\'t feel it befits the purposes of a rogue/ranger/assassin.

I ported the Thalmor hood model and retextured the hood from scratch with an emphasis on maintaining the look and feel of the dragonscale armor and an attempt at keeping the file size of the mod as low as possible. I utilized texture elements from the armor\'s torso to match the scales precisely. I then matched up any metal bits from scratch as closely as possible. The main texture file is 2048x2048; This was unavoidable as the texture for the hood is located within the texture file that also includes the rest of the Thalmor armor, and is therefore scaled approximately 75% already. There should, however, be no performance loss, as it only pulls about 1024x1024 amount of data from the texture to render. This will not interfere with the Thalmor armor in-game.

The model works for all races and genders, and I made sure to test this thoroughly. That doesn\'t mean that I didn\'t miss a clipping issue somewhere, but I was vigilant. 

[color=deepskyblue][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color]

To Install these textures: 

1. Unpack the .rar into your Skyrim/ directory.
2. Select yes if a permission box pops up to overwrite any other dragonscale texture and/or mesh files that may be floating around.

To Uninstall just delete the files pertinent to this mod.

[color=deepskyblue][b]OTHER INFO[/b][/color]

Known Issues: None so far. I can\'t fathom one that would arise. It\'s all fairly straight-forward

- I\'ll likely have other texture mods in the future, be sure to keep an eye out.

- Feel free to do what you wish with this mod without requesting permission. I would like to be provided with a link to any mod that uses my resources, however.

[color=deepskyblue][b]MY MODS[/b][/color]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2052][color=deepskyblue]Ethereal Elven Equipment[/color][/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4884][color=deepskyblue]DRAGONHOOD[/color][/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5204][color=deepskyblue]Unusual Gem Redux[/color][/url]
author: fume0101
